iati-activity.title: Umbrella Project for Market Opening Team Using 5% DFID Research Fund
iati-activity.description: Umbrella Project for Market Opening Team using 5% DfID Research Fund – that will cover small research projects (<£25k) commissioned by the Market Opening Team using 5% research fund. The individual research projects are united by the common purpose of: research to ensure that opening markets contribute to development. They cover/are likely to cover research that feeds directly into policy on Economic Partnership Agreements, Agriculture, Intellectual Property, Services, Global Finance and Climate Change.

iati-activity.title: Institute for Security Studies Baseline Study on Security Sector Governance in Southern Africa
iati-activity.description: To undertake a baseline study on security sector governance at the national and sub-regional level with a view to identifying key leverage points at the international, regional, sub-regional and national levels for interventions to enhance the democratic governance of the security sector in Southern Africa.
